filetext.searchfrom: The name of a configuration that this configuration inherits from.  Any unset properties in this configuration file will be inherited from the base configuration file named here.
filetext.replaceto: 此配置继承自的配置名称。此配置文件中的任何未设置属性将从此基配置文件继承。

filetext.searchfrom: The target architecture that the compiler generates code for.
filetext.replaceto: 编译器生成代码的目标体系结构。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the compiler will be started automatically if a crash occurs.
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，编译器将在崩溃时自动启动。

filetext.searchfrom: This option affects code entered into the Debug Console
filetext.replaceto: 此选项影响调试控制台中输入的代码

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will return to a breakpoint if you execute code in the debugger that triggers a deeper breakpoint
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将返回到断点，如果在调试器中执行代码，该代码会触发更深的断点

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will refresh all variables and watch expressions when you change a variable value from inside the debugger
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将在更改变量值时刷新所有变量和监视表达式

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will switch and bind to vtable interfaces when a dispinterface is marked as dual
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将在标记为双接口的 dispinterface 上切换和绑定到 vtable 接口

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will sort local variables alphabetically in the Variables panel.  If NO, they will appear in the order they are declared
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将按字母顺序对本地变量进行排序。如果否，它们将按声明的顺序出现。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will sort UDT members alphabetically in the Variables panel.  If NO, they will appear in the order they are declared
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将按字母顺序对用户定义类型成员进行排序。如果否，它们将按声明的顺序出现。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will sort class field members alphabetically in the Variables panel.  If NO, they will appear in the order they are declared.
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将按字母顺序对类字段成员进行排序。如果否，它们将按声明的顺序出现。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will show any padding members that the compiler has added to UDTs.  Only applicable when [Debugger: Sort Fields Alphabetically] is NO
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将显示编译器为 UDT 添加的任何填充成员。仅当 [调试器: 按字母顺序排序字段] 为 NO 时才适用。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will show non-decimal numeric values in hexadecimal form
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将在十六进制形式中显示非十进制数值

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will hide members that are marked as hidden or non-browsable
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将隐藏标记为隐藏或不可浏览的成员

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the debugger will show the raw value of object pointers (i.e. the raw memory location where the object is stored)
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将显示对象指针的原始值（即对象存储的原始内存位置）

filetext.searchfrom: if YES, the debugger will report the time taken to execute the line of code immediately beneath the result
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，调试器将在结果下方的行代码执行所需的时间

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, intellisense will show members that are marked as hidden or non-browsable
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，智能感知将显示标记为隐藏或不可浏览的成员

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, intellisense will show interfaces that are determined to be event source interfaces
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，智能感知将显示确定为事件源接口的接口

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, intellisense will show interfaces that are determined to be default interfaces of classes
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，智能感知将显示确定为类默认接口的接口

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, intellisense will hide interfaces and members that have names that start with an underscore
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，智能感知将隐藏以下划线开头的接口和成员

filetext.searchfrom: Use 0 to indicate that a random available port number be used
filetext.replaceto: 如果为0，则使用随机可用端口号

filetext.searchfrom: Use 0 to indicate that a random available port number be used
filetext.replaceto: 如果为0，则使用随机可用端口号

filetext.searchfrom: Use 0 to indicate that a random available port number be used
filetext.replaceto: 如果为0，则使用随机可用端口号

filetext.searchfrom: Use 0 to indicate that a random available port number be used
filetext.replaceto: 如果为0，则使用随机可用端口号

filetext.searchfrom: when set to YES, the compiler will not be invoked.  Use this as a last resort to open project files without invoking compilation of the project, for instance if there is a significant compiler bug preventing the project from opening.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，则不会调用编译器。使用此作为最后的手段打开项目文件，例如，如果存在阻止项目打开的显著编译器错误。

filetext.searchfrom: Use of legacy DefType statements is strongly discouraged
This variable has been auto-declared by the compiler due to Option Explicit being OFF
filetext.replaceto: 由于Option Explicit为OFF，编译器自动声明了此变量

filetext.searchfrom: Datatype has not been explicitly declared so will default to Variant
filetext.replaceto: 未显式声明数据类型，将默认为Variant

filetext.searchfrom: [Exit Sub/Function] inside a Property-Get procedure is only supported for backwards compatibility.  Use [Exit Property] instead.
filetext.replaceto: [Exit Property] 仅用于向后兼容。请使用 [Exit Property] 代替。

filetext.searchfrom: Record length is ignored in binary mode
filetext.replaceto: 二进制模式下，记录长度被忽略

filetext.searchfrom: Use of legacy date/time property-let assignments are strongly discouraged
filetext.replaceto: 不建议使用旧的日期/时间属性-Let赋值

filetext.searchfrom: Possible misuse of hexadecimal literal notation
filetext.replaceto: 可能的十六进制字面量使用错误

filetext.searchfrom: It is strongly recommended to specify an [ InterfaceId() ] attribute for this class
filetext.replaceto: 强烈建议为此类指定 [ InterfaceId() ] 属性

filetext.searchfrom: The inline ByVal attribute is ignored on User Defined Types
filetext.replaceto: User Defined Types 上的ByVal属性被忽略

filetext.searchfrom: Use of legacy DLL {LEGACY.DLL} has been redirected to {MODERN.DLL}
filetext.replaceto: 已将旧的DLL {LEGACY.DLL} 重定向到 {MODERN.DLL}

filetext.searchfrom: This is the namespace symbol used to represent the project via code.  If a type library is generated, this is the type library name
filetext.replaceto: 这是用于表示项目的命名空间符号，如果生成了类型库，则为类型库名称

filetext.searchfrom: If a type library is generated, this is the type library description.  You can include compiler variables here, such as ${Architecture}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}
filetext.replaceto: 如果生成了类型库，则为类型库描述。  您可以在这里包含编译器变量，例如${Architecture}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}

filetext.searchfrom: This is used for the default title caption of MsgBox and InputBox, and also is the value returned from the App.Title property
filetext.replaceto: 这是用于MsgBox和InputBox的默认标题标题，并且也用于App.Title属性返回的值

filetext.searchfrom: This is accesible at runtime via the App.HelpFile property, and is used in the Forms runtime help system (F1 / WhatsThis)
filetext.replaceto: 这是可在运行时通过App.HelpFile属性访问的，并且在表单运行时帮助系统(F1 / WhatsThis)中使用

filetext.searchfrom: This is the form that will be shown at startup, or 'Sub Main'.  If not specified, 'Sub Main' is the default for EXEs, '(none)' is the default for DLLs.
filetext.replaceto: 这是在启动时显示的表单，或'Sub Main'。 如果未指定，则'Sub Main'是EXE的默认，'(none)'是DLL的默认。

filetext.searchfrom: Select references that will be used during compilation of this project
filetext.replaceto: 选择将用于编译此项目的引用

filetext.searchfrom:
Define how the compiler is to treat warnings inside this project. These settings can be overriden with Class/Module/procedure attributes: 
[ EnforceWarnings(TBxxxx) ]
[ EnforceErrors(TBxxxx) ]
[ IgnoreWarnings(TBxxxx) ]
filetext.replaceto:
定义编译器如何处理在此项目中内部的警告。 这些设置可以被覆盖类/模块/过程属性：
[ EnforceWarnings(TBxxxx) ]
[ EnforceErrors(TBxxxx) ]
[ IgnoreWarnings(TBxxxx) ]

filetext.searchfrom: A unique GUID that represents this project.
filetext.replaceto: 一个唯一的GUID，表示此项目。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the compiler will use the project ID for the type library ID.  If NO, a unique type library ID will be generated during the build process.
filetext.replaceto: 如果是，编译器将使用项目ID作为类型库ID。 如果否，在生成过程中将生成一个唯一的类型库ID。

filetext.searchfrom: Enter the full path to the output file that will be created by the compiler.  Available variables: ${SourcePath}, ${ProjectName}, ${ProjectID}, ${FileExtension}, ${Architecture}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}
filetext.replaceto: 输入编译器将创建的文件的完整路径。 可用变量：${SourcePath}, ${ProjectName}, ${ProjectID}, ${FileExtension}, ${Architecture}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}

filetext.searchfrom: The output file type generated by the compiler.
filetext.replaceto: 编译器生成的文件类型。

filetext.searchfrom: For packages pushed into the package database, this lets the user clearly see the licence of your package
filetext.replaceto: 对于推送到包数据库中的包，这允许用户清楚地看到您的包的许可证

filetext.searchfrom: For packages pushed into the package database, this determines if the package is available to everyone (PUBLIC) or just the publisher (PRIVATE)
filetext.replaceto: 对于推送到包数据库中的包，这确定包是否对所有人可用(公共)或仅发布者可用(私有)

filetext.searchfrom: The major version number associated with the build.
filetext.replaceto: 与构建关联的主版本号。

filetext.searchfrom: The minor version number associated with the build.
filetext.replaceto: 与构建关联的次版本号。

filetext.searchfrom: The build version number associated with the build.
filetext.replaceto: 与构建关联的构建版本号。

filetext.searchfrom: The revision version number associated with the build.
filetext.replaceto: 与构建关联的修订版本号。

filetext.searchfrom: The ProductName text that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的ProductName文本。

filetext.searchfrom: The CompanyName text that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的CompanyName文本。

filetext.searchfrom: The FileDescription text that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的文件Description文本。

filetext.searchfrom: The LegalCopyright text that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的 LegalCopyright文本。

filetext.searchfrom: The LegalTrademarks text that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的 LegalTrademarks文本。

filetext.searchfrom: Comments that will be included in the generated VERSIONINFO resource for this file.
filetext.replaceto: 将在生成此文件版本信息资源时包含的注释。

filetext.searchfrom: If you want the version number to be automatically increased by 1 after a successful build, choose the part of the build number to be increased here.  VB6 always uses the Revision field for the auto-increment field.
filetext.replaceto: 如果希望在成功生成后自动增加版本号，请在此处选择要增加的构建号部分。 VB6总是使用修订字段进行自动增量字段。

filetext.searchfrom: If the build type is [ActiveX DLL] or [ActiveX Control], this flag affects the generated DllRegisterServer/DllUnregisterServer implementations, causing the DLL to be registered into the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE registry hive rather than the HKEY_CURRENT_USER.  VB6 DLLs register to the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE registry hive, but this requires elevated permissions.  With this option set to YES, you will usually need to open the IDE with the "Run As Administrator" option.
filetext.replaceto: 如果编译类型是[ActiveX DLL]或[ActiveX Control]，则此标志影响生成的DllRegisterServer/DllUnregisterServer实现，导致DLL被注册到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE注册表hive而不是HKEY_CURRENT_USER。 VB6 DLLs注册到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE注册表hive，但这需要提升权限。如果此选项设置为YES，通常需要打开IDE并选择“以管理员身份运行”选项。

filetext.searchfrom: If the build type is [ActiveX DLL] or [ActiveX Control], this flag being YES causes the generated DLL to be registered automatically by the IDE immediately after the build is complete.  Set to NO if you want to manually control registration of the generated DLL.
filetext.replaceto: 如果编译类型是[ActiveX DLL]或[ActiveX Control]，则此标志设置为YES会导致生成的DLL在生成后立即自动注册IDE。如果要手动控制生成的DLL的注册，请将其设置为NO。

filetext.searchfrom: Choose how COM/OLE will be initialized in built EXEs.  The default is OleInitialize, to match VB6.  This option has no effect on DLL builds.  This option allows you to override the threading model [ STA/MTA ]
filetext.replaceto: 选择如何在生成的EXE中初始化COM/OLE。默认值为OleInitialize，与VB6匹配。此选项对DLL构建没有影响。此选项允许您覆盖线程模型[ STA/MTA ]

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, built executables will be marked as CONSOLE applications rather than GUI applications.
filetext.replaceto: 如果YES，生成的可执行文件将被标记为CONSOLE应用程序，而不是GUI应用程序。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, built compilations will be marked as NATIVE (IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_NATIVE), suitable for kernel device drivers
filetext.replaceto: 如果YES，生成的编译将被标记为NATIVE（IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_NATIVE），适用于内核设备驱动程序

filetext.searchfrom: If you supply the name of a procedure here, it will be used as the entrypoint for the built executable.  By overriding this, you are responsible for all initialization of subsystems like COM/OLE.  This option is typically used only for native kernel mode builds.
filetext.replaceto: 如果提供过程名称，则将使用生成的可执行文件的入口点。通过覆盖此选项，您负责所有子系统的初始化，例如COM/OLE。此选项通常只用于本机内核模式构建。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, Declares inside your project will be resolved at runtime.  If NO, Declares inside your project will be added to the import address table (IAT) of your built executables.  NOTE: This setting does not affect DLL declares that are defined in type libraries, which are always added to the IAT.
filetext.replaceto: 如果YES，编译器将在运行时解析项目内部声明。如果NO，编译器将在生成的可执行文件中添加到导入地址表（IAT）中。注意：此设置不影响在类型库中定义的DLL声明，因为它们总是添加到IAT中。

filetext.searchfrom: Enter a colon delimited list of name=value pairs used by the compiler during conditional compilation evaluation.  Values in the range -32768 to 32767 are allowed.  for example:   foo=42:bar=-42
filetext.replaceto: 在编译器进行条件编译评估时，请输入以冒号分隔的名称=值对列表。范围为-32768到32767的值是允许的。例如：foo=42:bar=-42

filetext.searchfrom: This option takes effect if Option Explicit On/Off is not specified in the source file
filetext.replaceto: 如果在源文件中未指定Option Explicit On/Off，则此选项将生效

filetext.searchfrom: When set to YES, the case of words will be automatically corrected as you type, and spacing will be corrected to normal VBE standards.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，当您键入时，将自动纠正单词的大小写，并将间距纠正为VBE标准。

filetext.searchfrom: When set to YES, "▶   run {procedure name}" will be shown in the CodeLens above no-argument procedures in standard modules
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，“▶   运行 {过程名称}”将在标准模块中显示在无参数过程的CodeLens上

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the compiler will use unicode versions of the Windows API calls whenever possible (e.g. MsgBox will call MessageBoxW rather than MessageBoxA)
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，编译器将尽可能使用Unicode版本的Windows API调用（例如，MsgBox将调用MessageBoxW而不是MessageBoxA）

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, the compiler will include procedure name symbols in built EXEs and DLLs.  These symbols are used when enumerating the live callstack information.  When disabled, ErrorStackFrame interface will return "{unknown}" for symbols in built executables.  When enabled, this option minorly increases the size of built executables, but does not harm runtime performance.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，编译器将在生成的EXE和DLL中包括过程名称符号。这些符号用于枚举实时调用堆栈信息。当禁用时，ErrorStackFrame接口将返回“{unknown}”对于在生成的可执行文件中定义的符号。当启用时，此选项会微小增加生成的可执行文件的大小，但不会影响运行时性能。

filetext.searchfrom: increasing this value uses more memory, but for larger projects will increase compilation performance
filetext.replaceto: 增加此值使用更多内存，但对于较大的项目会提高编译性能。注意：编译器将警告您达到此限制时需要更改此值

filetext.searchfrom: increasing this value uses more memory, but allows for compilation of larger projects.  NOTE: the compiler will warn you when you reach this limit and need to alter this value
filetext.replaceto: 增加此值使用更多内存，但允许较大的项目的编译。注意：编译器将警告您达到此限制时需要更改此值

filetext.searchfrom: increasing this value uses more memory, but allows for compilation of larger projects.  NOTE: the compiler will warn you when you reach this limit and need to alter this value
filetext.replaceto: 增加此值使用更多内存，但允许较大的项目的编译。注意：编译器将警告您达到此限制时需要更改此值

filetext.searchfrom: increasing this value uses more memory, but allows for compilation of larger projects.  NOTE: the compiler will warn you when you reach this limit and need to alter this value
filetext.replaceto: 增加此值使用更多内存，但允许较大的项目的编译。注意：编译器将警告您达到此限制时需要更改此值

filetext.searchfrom: when set to YES, the compiler ensures Boolean values outputted from external sources contain absolute True[-1] or False[0] values.  This ensures other inappropriate values such as [1] don't get stuffed into a Boolean datatype.  Minor performance impact.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，编译器确保从外部源输出的布尔值包含绝对True[-1]或False[0]值。这可以确保将不适当的值（例如[1]）打包到布尔数据类型中。小性能影响。

filetext.searchfrom: (EXPERIMENTAL) when set to YES, the compiler will convert some function calls to constant literals during compilation, when the result is known to be fully determinstic at compile time.  Only function calls in the VBA standard library are affected by this setting, plus any standard module functions that you have explicitly marked with the attribute [ ConstantFoldable ].
filetext.replaceto: (试验性)如果设置为YES，编译器将在编译时将一些函数调用转换为常量字面量，当结果已知且在编译时完全确定时。此设置仅影响VBA标准库中的函数调用，以及您已显式标记为[ ConstantFoldable ]的任何标准模块函数。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, 32-bit EXE builds of this project will have the LARGE ADDRESS AWARE flag set on them, allowing them to access upto 4GB of memory.  If NO, 32-bit EXE builds are limited to 2GB memory space.  Use with caution, as your code and any third party DLLs must all be compatible.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，此项目的32位EXE构建将具有“大地址感知”标志，允许它们访问4GB内存。如果NO，32位EXE构建受限于2GB内存空间。使用时请谨慎，因为您的代码和任何第三方DLL必须兼容。

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, built executables will be marked as TS-aware.  This flag affects some Windows API calls, such as Get­Windows­Directory, when running on a Terminal Server.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，生成的可执行文件将被标记为TS-Aware。此标志影响一些Windows API调用，例如在Terminal Server上运行时Get-Windows-Directory，当运行时运行时Get-Windows-Directory

filetext.searchfrom: If YES, built executables will be marked as DEP-aware.  On compatible hardware, this hardens your executables from attacks against code injection at runtime
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，生成的可执行文件将被标记为DEP-Aware。在兼容的硬件上，这将保护您的可执行文件免受运行时代码注入攻击的影响

filetext.searchfrom: Enter a path that will be used for the `Export Project` command.  When set, this path will be used instead of being prompted each time the command is invoked.
filetext.replaceto: 输入将用于“导出项目”命令的路径。当设置时，将使用此路径而不是每次调用命令时都提示用户。

filetext.searchfrom:
WARNING: BE CAREFUL! The export folder will be EMPTIED before export to ensure that the export is clean.

Available variables: ${SourcePath}, ${ProjectName}, ${ProjectFileName}, ${ProjectID}, ${FileExtension}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}
filetext.replaceto:
警告：请谨慎！在导出之前，导出文件夹将被清除，以确保导出是干净的。

可用的变量：${SourcePath}, ${ProjectName}, ${ProjectFileName}, ${ProjectID}, ${FileExtension}, ${VersionMajor}, ${VersionMinor}, ${VersionBuild}, ${VersionRevision}

filetext.searchfrom: When this option is set to YES, the `Export Project` will automatically run, using the provided Export Path setting, immediately after the twinproj file is saved to disk.
filetext.replaceto: 当此选项设置为YES时，“导出项目”将自动运行，使用提供的导出路径设置，立即在保存twinproj文件到磁盘后。

filetext.searchfrom: When this option is set to YES, the `Export Project` will report every file operation (even when successful).
filetext.replaceto: 当此选项设置为YES时，“导出项目”将报告每个文件操作（即使成功）。

filetext.searchfrom: Set this option to 无 to turn off DPI-awareness, or to control the DPI awareness of your application via a manifest manually.  Setting other values here causes the SetProcessDpiAwareness API to be used when available.
filetext.replaceto: 将此选项设置为无来关闭DPI感知，或者通过手动创建清单来控制应用程序的DPI感知。在这里设置其他值将导致使用SetProcessDpiAwareness API的可用性。

filetext.searchfrom: text entered here will be available in runtime debug sessions via the VBA.Interaction.Command$ function
filetext.replaceto: 在这里输入的文本将在运行时调试会话中通过VBA.Interaction.Command$函数可用

filetext.searchfrom: if YES, when live values such as Strings, Variants and Arrays are released, their original content is first overwritten with garbage data.
filetext.replaceto: 如果设置为YES，当释放诸如字符串、Variant和数组之类的实时值时，它们的原始内容首先被覆盖为垃圾数据。

filetext.searchfrom: The OS often does not erase the content of memory until absoluately necessary (i.e. when the memory area is re-used).
filetext.replaceto: 操作系统通常不会在绝对必要时擦除内存的内容（即当内存区域被重新使用时）。

filetext.searchfrom: This often leads to bugs in code that makes wrong assumptions about the lifetime of pointers.
filetext.replaceto: 这往往导致错误的假设，即指针的生存期。在大多数情况下，您可能可以通过使用过时的指针来绕过这些错误，但这会导致非常微妙的错误，只有偶尔才会出现。使用此功能来帮助检测代码中的这些错误。在调试时会有小的性能影响。

filetext.searchfrom: In the majority of cases you might get away with using a stale pointer, but this leads to very subtle bugs that only show up occasionally.  Use this feature to aid in detecting such bugs in your code.  There is a small performance impact during debugging.
filetext.replaceto: 在大多数情况下，您可能可以通过使用过时的指针来绕过这些错误，但这会导致非常微妙的错误，只有偶尔才会出现。使用此功能来帮助检测代码中的这些错误。在调试时会有小的性能影响。

filetext.searchfrom: Changing this value modifies the PE header of built executables.  Default value is 1MB.  If you experience procedures that crash at runtime with stack overflow errors, try increasing this value.
filetext.replaceto: 更改此值会修改生成的可执行文件的PE标头。默认值为1MB。如果您在运行时遇到堆栈溢出错误，请尝试增加此值。

filetext.searchfrom: Show the list of ENABLED libraries (references / packages) in this project
filetext.replaceto: 显示此项目中启用的库（引用/包）列表

filetext.replaceto: 显示此计算机上可用的引用列表

filetext.searchfrom:
Package needed: WinNativeForms

You must first add a reference to the WinNativeForms package in this project.

After clicking `Add WinNativeForms package`, the compiler will be restarted,
ready for you to add forms to this project.
filetext.replaceto:
需要的包: Win原生窗体

您必须首先在此项目中添加“Win原生窗体包”的引用。

点击`添加Win原生窗体包`后，编译器将会重启，
准备好您添加到此项目中的窗体。

filetext.searchfrom:
Components list coming soon!

For now, you must add ordinary COM references to the approriate ActiveX type library,
and the components will then appear here in the form designer automatically.
filetext.replaceto:
组件列表即将来临!

目前，您必须添加普通的COM引用到适当的ActiveX类型库，
并在窗体设计器中将组件自动添加到这里。

filetext.searchfrom: Add a form to the project
You've made changes to this project. Save now?
filetext.replaceto: Sie haben Änderungen in diesem Projekt, Möchten Sie diese jetzt speichern？

filetext.searchfrom: Do you want to save the changes you made to
Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.
filetext.replaceto: Ohne zu speichern gehen alle Änderungen verloren

filetext.searchfrom:
Option Explicit:

When this project option is ON, the compiler will always enter 'Option Explicit' mode when compiling code, regardless of whether you have specified 'Option Explicit' at the top of each module or class.

It is highly recommended to leave this project setting ON.
filetext.replaceto:
Option Explicit:

When this project option is ON, the compiler will always enter 'Option Explicit' mode when compiling code, regardless of whether you have specified 'Option Explicit' at the top of each module or class.

It is highly recommended to leave this project setting ON.

filetext.searchfrom:
Visual Styles:

With this setting on, a manifest file will be embedded into your generated executables that causes Windows to theme the standard controls.

It is highly recommended to leave this option ON.
filetext.replaceto:
Visual Styles:

Mit Dieser Einstellung wird eine Manifestdatei in die Ausführbare Exe integriert, die Windows veranlasst Alle Standard-Controls mit dem neuesten theme anzuzeigen.

Es wird dringend empfohlen diese Option anzulassen.

filetext.searchfrom:
Register to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE:

The VB6 legacy compiler generates DLLs that register themselves to the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE registry hive.  Doing so requires elevated permissions on modern operating systems.

To avoid this, you can instead register your DLLs to the HKEY_CURRENT_USER registry hive which does not require elevated permissions.

NOTE: if your ActiveX host (such as VB6, or Access, etc) runs elevated, then you must register your ActiveX class to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, otherwise the host will not see it.
filetext.replaceto:
注册到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE:

VB6旧版编译器生成的DLL将自注册到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE注册表hive。 这需要在现代操作系统上具有提升权限。

要避免此问题，您可以注册到HKEY_CURRENT_USER注册表hive，它不需要提升权限。

注意：如果您的ActiveX主机（例如VB6，或Access等）运行于提升的权限下，则必须将您的ActiveX类注册到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE，否则主机将无法看到它。

filetext.searchfrom: Include Common Controls:\n\nWith this option ON, the WinNativeCommonCtls package will be referenced by your project.  This allows you to use controls such as TreeView, UpDown, MonthView and DTPicker.
filetext.replaceto: Include Common Controls:\n\nWith this option ON, the WinNativeCommonCtls package will be referenced by your project.  This allows you to use controls such as TreeView, UpDown, MonthView and DTPicker

filetext.searchfrom:
DPI Awareness:

With this option set to NONE, on high-DPI screens your application will be scaled by the operating system unless you manage the embedded manifest file yourself.

With this option set to SYSTEM_DPI_AWARE or PER_MONITOR_DPI_AWARE, your application will be considered DPI-aware and NOT scaled by the operating system.
filetext.replaceto:
DPI Awareness:

With this option set to NONE, on high-DPI screens your application will be scaled by the operating system unless you manage the embedded manifest file yourself.

With this option set to SYSTEM_DPI_AWARE or PER_MONITOR_DPI_AWARE, your application will be considered DPI-aware and NOT scaled by the operating system.

filetext.searchfrom: \n\nNOTE: with DPI-awareness ON, if you write code that uses Win32 API graphics calls directly, you must account for high-DPI systems in your positional calculations.
filetext.replaceto: \n\nNOTE: with DPI-awareness ON, if you write code that uses Win32 API graphics calls directly, you must account for high-DPI systems in your positional calculations

filetext.searchfrom: "This will reset the panel layout data.  Are you sure you want to do this?\n\nAfterwards, you will need to close and restart the IDE in order to see the changes."
filetext.replaceto: "Das Panel Layout wird zurückgesetzt. Sind Sie sicher？\n\nDie Änderungen wreden erst nach einem Neustart sichtbar"
